candidates.why: Same planning-only intent and same artifact family (IMPL_PLAN.md + IMPL-*.json + TODO_LIST.md) generated via (test-)action-planning-agent.
Action-planning-agent driven task generation with strict test-focused structure; useful for task JSON conventions and validation language.
Upstream test analysis stage; establishes required input (TEST_ANALYSIS_RESULTS.md) and Gemini-driven analysis patterns.
Provides test-context-package.json input contract; shows allowed-tools and agent delegation style for test workflows.
Top-level orchestrator that calls test-task-generate; good for end-to-end chaining and user-facing expectations.

selected.why: Closest match for planning-only task/doc generation behavior and artifact outputs.
